author: jaggerbellagarda
title: Verifiable NFT-based resumes/CV
description: The current verification of work experience and job-related documents can be a costly and time-consuming process.
solution: The ability to verify the authenticity of work-related documents (i.e., Degrees) and work experience as Non-fungible Tokens (NFTs).
experience: The team consists of 5 individuals - business development, technical architecture, scrum master, mobile expert and a blockchain developer.
